text: The sun sets, the mushrooms wake up, and the danger increases.
$(br2)In dark areas on and near the surface a new grave type will spawn, the Night Grave.
This grave is dangerous, because it can spawn zombies tougher than before.
$(br2)If you didn't do this already, it's recommended to place some potato mines near your plants.
$(br2)Mushrooms are nocturnal Plants, meaning that they can only function when it's dark.
$(br2)To make mushrooms you will need Mushroom Plant Food, they are acquired by harvesting either a
Button-shroom (Day spawn) or a Puff-shroom (Night spawn).
$(br)After getting some Mushroom Plant Food make some new Plants.
$(br2)Scaredy-shroom will deal with zombies from afar, helping thinning their numbers. They also poison the target.
The next plant you can make is the Fume-shroom. It's a better Bellflower.
$(br2)One of the main uses of the Fume-shroom is dealing with shielded zombies, like the Screen Door Zombie, as it will deal direct damage to the zombie instead of the shield.
$(br2)Just don't depend on it to deal with Newspaper Zombies, as they have way more non-shield health and will quickly eat the Fume-shroom after being attacked.
$(br)While these mushrooms are great for their cost, be mindful of depending on them at this stage of the game, as they will fall asleep during daytime.
$(br2)The more days pass, the tougher the zombies get, so it's recommended to stay awake during the night to get more resources instead of sleeping.
